text: Basic principle: when you work hard & play by the rules, you deserve a fair shot to build prosperous future & earn #PassportToTheMiddleClass

While a man would take home $47k/yr– for the same work–a woman’s paycheck would be $16k less a yr. That's $1,300 less per month! #equalpay

In FY12, Corps only spent $6.4m 4 LA new construction. That’s unacceptable. We need flood protection & wetlands restoration & we need it now

The federal role in disaster response cannot be the responsibility of @FEMA alone. #IsaacRecovery
We must do more to protect #LA communities. For every $1 taxpayers invest in mitigation, they save $4 in disaster response #IsaacRecovery
We know disasters will happen every year, but w/ smart planning & effective response, we can minimize widespread damage. #IsaacRecovery
